recommendations.name: Error Lens
recommendations.why: Highlights errors instantly so you can copy-paste them into Cursor chat for quick fixes. Critical for backend debugging.

recommendations.name: Docker
recommendations.why: Helps Cursor write and debug containerization scripts. Essential for video worker Dockerfile and deployments.

recommendations.name: Prisma
recommendations.why: Database client and schema visualization. Even though we use Drizzle, this helps Cursor understand database patterns.

recommendations.name: REST Client
recommendations.why: Test APIs within editor, then ask Cursor to write fetch logic based on responses. Perfect for testing Synapse Bridge endpoints.

recommendations.name: Tailwind CSS IntelliSense
recommendations.why: Autocomplete for Tailwind classes in frontend components. Improves Cursor's suggestions for UI code.

recommendations.name: Python
recommendations.why: Essential for Windows-Use bridge service. Helps Cursor understand Python syntax and patterns.

recommendations.name: Pylance
recommendations.why: Python language server for better type checking and IntelliSense in bridge_service.py.

recommendations.name: ESLint
recommendations.why: Catches TypeScript/JavaScript errors before runtime. Helps Cursor provide better code suggestions.

recommendations.name: Jest
recommendations.why: Run tests from editor. Cursor can watch test output and fix failing tests automatically.

recommendations.name: TypeScript Nightly
recommendations.why: Latest TypeScript features. Essential for strict typing in Synapse Bridge and Colony OS code.
